title: Quack
description: A simple, practical watchface for fitbit watches that's packed with features and fully customisable.

externalLink.text: Check it out in the Fitbit gallery

title: guhrli
description: Watchface capable of displaying continuous glucose monitoring (cgm) data from a variety of sources where the time changes colour to inform users of dangerous levels.

externalLink.text: Check it out in the Fitbit gallery
